name: Windows Password List
summary: Learn about .PWL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PWL files are used to automatically authenticate users at login screens after they have checked the "Remember Password" option.
PWL files are similar to .KEYCHAIN files in Mac OS X.

description: Password file used by Windows for user logins and network and dial-up passwords; may contain up to 255 passwords, each of which stores a resource type, name, and password; stored in a proprietary encrypted format in the Windows directory.
